::Grounded::
Grounded realized just as Wildrider got to the vines that he would go
right through them because of his momentum. "Enough time to get away
tho" he said...Instantly the huge tree transformed into a tiny plant
formin order to move to his safe spot 100 m away should Wildrider be
able to hi the ground again where Grounded was now as a plant...If not
he would completely over shoot...Grounded reactivated his other
gaseous plants and the mists started shooting again behindof Grounded
right in front of Wildriders new path becasue the tree was not there...


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Wildrider barreled through the vines towards the ground. With the added
> momentum of gravity, he was traveling to fast to be caught by them,
while
> he was in the air. He hit the ground, and maneuvered gracefully (or was
> swerving because of bad driving) towards the main tree. Then when he got
> close to the roots, the car lifted itself into the air, and began
tumbeling
> towards grounded again.
